Reviews.Title: “Terrific Stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: jenn194
Reviews.Content: found thursday car 808 miles home doing mapquest figured indianapolis closest stop stopped checked signed papers finish unloading car laid bed melted bed fell asleep instantly havent sleep months due medical reasons slept 7 hours straight stay definately hampton inn comfort polite staff desk breakfast overwelming huge selection staying tonight

Reviews.Content: night driving east destination richmond hotels richmond considerably expensive indianapolis chose east indianapolis avoid morning traffic left lots hotel choices interchange normally shopped lowest rate except time stay hilton property maintain rewards program privileges hilton brands hampton east expensive taxes stay close 100 enjoyed stay hotel looks fairly looked lobby inviting desk staff helpful friendly floor king bed couch probably sleeper didnt check tv desk refrigerator microwave hotel provides free internet access wired wireless bathroom clean fine shape plenty move main road overlooking bob evans restaurant parking quiet night restaurants ranging fast food family restaurants hotel includes breakfast cereals oatmeal yogurt fruit mini cheese omelets potatoes juice coffee breakfast clean stocked indoor pool looked inviting swim overall hampton east pleasant stay cheapest value stay cs btw gfs marketplace street restaurant supply company maintains retail outlets public worth looking kitchen supplies food items
